message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be a valuable asset to you. Given its unique features and benefits, I'm offering it at a starting price of $20,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price, but my initial offer reflects the true value of this product.  It offers significant long-term advantages. I'm willing to meet you halfway - how about $17,000?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $14,000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider meeting me at $14,000?
